subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Starter Tom Glavine got blitzed, the Mets could not hit, and the Rockies’ pitching staff held the Mets scoreless until the eighth inning on Monday night.
snippet: Starter Tom Glavine got blitzed, the Mets could not hit, and the Rockies’ pitching staff held the Mets scoreless until the eighth inning on Monday night.
